Hi,
    Tokugawa Hideyoshi gave the Himeji castle (it is also know as Shirasagi (White Egret)), to Ikeda Terumasa after defeating Toyotomi's armies.  It was then occupied by 48 succeeding Lords. Could anyone thro any light on their names please.
    Cliff B.
